result.eng: Go down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ga: téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar shráid na gceannaithe
result.orig: téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar shráid na gceannaithe
result.html: téigí síos an bóthar sin agus feicfidh sibh stad na mbusanna ansin ar shráid na gceannaitheGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.
result.ponchtml: téigí síos an bóṫar sin agus feicfiḋ siḃ stad na mbusanna ansin ar ẛráid na gceannaiṫeGo down that road and you will see the bus stop there on Merchants Road.

result.eng: Some people never stop laughing at them.
result.ga: tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áirithe
result.orig: tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áirithe
result.html: tá siad de shíor ina gceap magaidh ag daoine áiritheSome people never stop laughing at them.
result.ponchtml: tá siad de ẛíor ina gceap magaiḋ ag daoine áiriṫeSome people never stop laughing at them.

result.eng: As we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ga: mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn
result.orig: mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn
result.html: mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ponchtml: mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na naitsiṫe leis an bpolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: níor stop na naitsiṫe leis an bpolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: All the children started laughing and couldn't stop.
result.ga: fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáirí
result.orig: fágadh iomlán na bpáistí sioctha leis na gáirí

result.ponchtml: fágaḋ iomlán na bpáistí siocṫa leis na gáiríAll the children started laughing and couldn't stop.

result.eng: He wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ga: ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.orig: ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.html: ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ a ċeann le tógáil aige as ólaċánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.eng: Shut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
result.ga: druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidí
result.orig: druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidí
result.html: druid do bhéal ó do chuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.
result.ponchtml: druid do ḃéal ó do ċuid amaidíShut your mouth and stop talking nonsense.

result.eng: It's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
result.ga: is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú air
result.orig: is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú air
